thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 8 of 523
thread.title: Judith

author: Judith
title: Judith
text: The dress is for my granddaughter. We had reservations about the fit because she is 5'9" and athletically built yet very slim in the waist, hips and legs and the dress is a two-piece. We ordered a large so it would fit her upper body. I wondered if the skirt would sag around her waist but it does not. Having waist and bust measurements on the web-site would have made me feel more confident in the size needed. I did appreciate having the height and shoe heel height on the model because that gave me a better idea of how long the dress would be. Overall we are very pleased with the appearance, quality and price of the dress.
